DataElement.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Negation Occurrence Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed activity which marks a study subject-specific, protocol-defined point in the course of a study. EXAMPLE(S): obtain informed consent, verify eligibility criteria, enroll, registration to a study, randomize, assignment to a treatment arm, start of on-study period, complete study visits, end of on-study period, exit trial, break treatment blind, protocol violation, premature withdrawal Specifies whether an activity did not occur. EXAMPLE(S): "Y" designates that the PerformedActivity is missed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Negation Occurrence Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.
Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
